This is the directory containig the data files used for XOP
applications. Files in this directory are:

README.TXT [this file]
dabax [directory] [used for DABAX applications in: Optics, etc.]
inpro [directory] [used by Optics/Crystals/Xinpro]
xcom  [directory] [used by Optics/Mirrors&Filters/XXcom]

The files in the DABAX directory can be taken from the DABAX data base.
See Xop->Optics->Dabax(Main interface)->File->Download new DABAX file... 
for updating your DABAX files.
